name: code-and-comment
author: 38elements
description: Code and Comment is the application to add the comments to a file in Github.

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:minify
scripts.build:js: rollup -c && rollup -c -i src/jsx/repositories.jsx -o dist/repositories.js && rollup -c -i src/jsx/codeAndComments.jsx -o dist/codeAndComments.js
scripts.build:minify: terser dist/app.js -c -m --ecma 8 -o dist/app.min.js && terser dist/repositories.js -c -m --ecma 8 -o dist/repositories.min.js && terser dist/codeAndComments.js -c -m --ecma 8 -o dist/codeAndComments.min.js
